mms.controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mms.controller.AbstractController
      • mms.controller.LoginController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAbstractController, ILoginController

    public class LoginController
extends AbstractController
implements ILoginController
    This class manage the functions of the login.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli
